metadata.title: CVE-2016-10403 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation on image data in PDFium in Google Chrome priorto 51.0.2704.63 allowed a remote attacker to perform an out of boundsmemory read via a crafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
